critique: This document is an executive order designating the Surgeon General of the Public Health Service as the "health administration" of the United States of America for the purpose of performing the duties prescribed and undertaken in the International Sanitary Regulations. It is related to international health regulations and disease prevention. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power expansion, federalism shift, national security vs. civil liberties concern, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores are neutral.
